cards.personal_message: The first time I saw you, I knew my life was about to change. I just didn't know how much better it would get.
You're the only person who can make me laugh so hard I forget what I was stressed about. Thanks for being my favorite weirdo.
Waking up and knowing you're mine is the best feeling in the world. I smile before I even open my eyes.
Do you know how hard it is to focus on anything when you look that good? You're a beautiful distraction and I'm not complaining.
You taught me what it means to truly care about someone. Before you, I didn't know love could feel this safe and this exciting at the same time.
Remember that time we couldn't stop laughing over literally nothing? That's my favorite kind of moment with you. Pure, ridiculous happiness.
I love the little things about you â€” the way you scrunch your nose, how excited you get about small things, and how warm your hand feels in mine.
If I could freeze one moment in time, it would be any moment where you're looking at me and smiling. That smile is my whole universe.
You're the reason I check my phone with a stupid grin on my face. My friends are starting to notice and honestly I don't even care.
In a world full of temporary things, you feel like forever. I want to build a life with you â€” every messy, beautiful, ordinary day of it.
You make even the most boring days feel special. Grocery shopping with you? An adventure. Doing nothing with you? The best plan ever.
I can't promise I'll be perfect, but I can promise that no one will ever try harder to make you happy. You deserve the world and I want to give it to you.
Tomorrow is Valentine's Day, but honestly every day with you feels like a celebration. I'm the luckiest person alive and I know it.
Happy Valentine's Day, baby! You are my best friend, my favorite person, and the love of my life. Today and always â€” I love you more than words will ever say.

gift_reveal.reveal_message: Happy Valentine's Day, baby! This is for you ğŸ
